title: Fantacia
description: The first in the Voxian Series Fantasy/Science Fiction Novels.Residing in a bell-shaped Universe is Galaxia, a world on the light side of the wonders. There rules the Goddess with her Angel children, who are immortal warriors of virtue.To the south there is a nebula bright and true in the shape of an eye, watching over all and inside rules the Angel King Kathos, with his warrior superheroes, powerful soldiers with swords, who are fighting against the dark dimensions, protecting all in the Universe from Evil. Meet Fantacia as she eaves a doomed Earth, follow her home to an alien planet where she becomes more powerful than she could ever of dreamed of.A wonderful new series created with every Fantasy and Science Fiction fan in mind. Myth & legends, worlds of Superheroes, Dragons, Reptilians, Angels and Demons.Fantasy beyond Fantasy, written in UK English.
author: Ruth Watson-Morris
